displayName.thai: จากทุกด้าน

description.english: Finish Kovac's first challenge while keeping the pylon intact.
description.german: Schließe Kovacs erste Herausforderung ab und sorge dafür, dass der Mast intakt bleibt.
description.french: Finir le premier défi de Kovac en gardant le pylône intact.
description.italian: Completa la prima sfida di Kovac mantenendo intatto il traliccio.
description.koreana: 코박의 첫 번째 도전을 철탑이 무사한 상태로 수행하기.
description.spanish: Acabar el primer desafío de Kovac manteniendo el poste intacto.
description.schinese: 完成柯瓦克的首个挑战，同时保持路标塔完好无损。
description.russian: Завершить первое задание Ковака, оставив столб нетронутым.
description.thai: ผ่านการท้าทายแรกของ Kovac โดยที่เสาไม่เสียหาย
description.japanese: パイロンを無傷に保ったまま、コバックの最初のチャレンジを終える
description.turkish: Sütunun zarar görmemesini sağlayarak Kovac'ın ilk görevini tamamla.
description.brazilian: Vença o primeiro desafio do Kovac mantendo o poste intacto.

displayName.thai: วัดรอยเท้า Kovac

description.english: Successfully complete half of Kovac's challenges while keeping the pylon intact.
description.german: Schließe erfolgreich die Hälfte von Kovacs Herausforderungen ab und sorge dafür, dass der Mast intakt bleibt.
description.french: Avoir réussi la moitié des défis de Kovac en gardant le pylône intact.
description.italian: Completa la metà delle sfide di Kovac mantenendo intatto il traliccio.
description.koreana: 코박의 도전의 반을 철탑이 무사한 상태로 성공적으로 수행하기.
description.spanish: Completar con éxito la mitad de los desafíos de Kovac manteniendo el poste intacto.
description.schinese: 成功完成了柯瓦克的半数挑战，同时保持路标塔完好无损。
description.russian: Успешно завершить половину заданий Ковака, оставив столб нетронутым.
description.thai: ผ่านการท้าทายครึ่งหนึ่งของ Kovac โดยที่เสาไม่เสียหาย
description.japanese: パイロンを無傷に保ったまま、コバックのチャレンジの半分をクリアする。
description.turkish: Sütunun zarar görmemesini sağlayarak Kovac'ın görevlerinin yarısını başarıyla tamamla.
description.brazilian: Vença a metade dos desafios do Kovac mantendo o poste intacto.

displayName.thai: ความภาคภูมิใจของ Kovac!
displayName.japanese: コバックの誇りと喜び！

description.english: Successfully complete all of Kovac's challenges while keeping the pylon intact.
description.german: Schließe erfolgreich alle von Kovacs Herausforderungen ab und sorge dafür, dass der Mast intakt bleibt.
description.french: Avoir réussi tous les défis de Kovac en gardant le pylône intact.
description.italian: Completa tutte le sfide di Kovac mantenendo intatto il traliccio.
description.koreana: 코박의 모든 도전을 철탑이 무사한 상태로 성공적으로 수행하기.
description.spanish: Completar con éxito todos los desafíos de Kovac manteniendo el poste intacto.
description.schinese: 成功完成了柯瓦克的全部挑战，同时保持路标塔完好无损。
description.russian: Успешно завершить все задания Ковака, оставив столб нетронутым.
description.thai: ผ่านการท้าทายทั้งหมดของ Kovac โดยที่เสาไม่เสียหาย

description.turkish: Sütunun zarar görmemesini sağlayarak Kovac'ın tüm görevlerini başarıyla tamamla.
description.brazilian: Vença todos os desafios do Kovac mantendo o poste intacto.

displayName.thai: กระสุนนัดเดียวได้นกสองตัว!
displayName.brazilian: Dois coelhos com uma cajadada só!

description.english: Kill 2 or more enemies at the same time with a melee weapon.
description.german: Töte 2 oder mehr Feinde gleichzeitig mit einer Nahkampfwaffe.
description.french: Tuer 2 ennemis ou plus en même temps avec une arme de mêlée.
description.italian: Uccidi 2 o più nemici contemporaneamente con un'arma da mischia.

description.spanish: Matar a 2 enemigos o más al mismo tiempo con un arma cuerpo a cuerpo.
description.schinese: 用近战武器同时杀死 2 个或更多的敌人。
description.russian: Убить 2 и более врагов одновременно при помощи холодного оружия.

description.brazilian: Mate 2 ou mais inimigos ao mesmo tempo com uma arma de combate corpo a corpo.

displayName.thai: ซอมบีคิว!

description.german: Töte mindestens 2 Infizierte mit einem Pfeil oder Armbrustbolzen.

description.spanish: Matar al menos a 2 infectados con una flecha o una flecha de ballesta.
description.schinese: 用一支箭或弩箭杀死 2 个受感染者。

description.turkish: Tek okla veya arbaletle en az 2 enfekte öldür.
